channel.title: How Do I Add A Timer At The Top Of The Screen Counting Down?
channel.description: Title Says All. I Need It Counting Down From 30minz (2300seconds).

item.title: How Do I Add A Timer At The Top Of The Screen Counting Down?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Find the interfaceId of the part you want to put it on:

sendQuest("Timer: "+timerName, interfaceID);

Under the process, put:

if(timerName > 0) {
timerName -= 1;
}

So it goes down by 1 every time it is called.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add A Timer At The Top Of The Screen Counting Down?

item.title: How Do I Add A Timer At The Top Of The Screen Counting Down?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

public boolean process() {
if(timer > 0)
{
timer–;
sendFrame126(timer);
}
